Description: Online accounting software for small business. Online invoices, expenses, cashflow, inventory and payroll.
Name: Saasu

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new and updated contacts for a given file since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Insert Contact
Methods.Description: Insert a contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update a contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact Aggregate
Methods.Description: Returns the details for a contact aggregate, consisting of the contact and its associated company and contact manager.

Methods.Name: Insert Contact Aggregate
Methods.Description: Insert a contact aggregate. Inserts the contact and inserts or updates the associated company and contact manager.

Methods.Name: Update Contact Aggregate
Methods.Description: Update a contact aggregate. Updates a contact and inserts or updates the associated company and contact manager.

Methods.Name: Get New Contacts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new contacts for a given file added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of updated contacts for a given file since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Delete a Contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves an individual contact.

Methods.Name: Get Account
Methods.Description: Returns a single account.

Methods.Name: Insert Account
Methods.Description: Insert an account.

Methods.Name: Delete Account
Methods.Description: Delete an account.

Methods.Name: Update Account
Methods.Description: Update an account.

Methods.Name: Get New Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new Account Detail records since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new and updated Account Detail records since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of updated Account Detail records since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Account records.

Methods.Name: Get Activity
Methods.Description: Return a single activity detail record.

Methods.Name: Insert Activity
Methods.Description: Insert an activity.

Methods.Name: Delete Activity
Methods.Description: Delete an activity.

Methods.Name: Update Activity
Methods.Description: Update an activity.

Methods.Name: Get New Activities
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new activity summary records added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Activities
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new and updated activity summary records added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Activities
Methods.Description: Returns a list of updated activity summary records since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Activities
Methods.Description: Returns a list of activity summary records.

Methods.Name: Delete Attachment
Methods.Description: Deletes an attachment with the specified attachment ID.

Methods.Name: Get Attachment
Methods.Description: Returns the attachment with the given attachment ID.

Methods.Name: List Invoice Attachments
Methods.Description: Returns all the information around attachments for a given invoice ID. Does not return the attachment itself, just the metadata/information regarding all attachments.

Methods.Name: List Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Invoice transaction summary records.

Methods.Name: Get Invoice
Methods.Description: Return a single Invoice Transaction Summary Record.

Methods.Name: Delete Invoice
Methods.Description: Delete an invoice.

Methods.Name: Create Invoice
Methods.Description: Insert an invoice.

Methods.Name: Update Invoice
Methods.Description: Update an invoice.

Methods.Name: Email Invoice
Methods.Description: Email an invoice to the billing contact.

Methods.Name: Email Invoice To Specified
Methods.Description: Email an invoice to the specified email address.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Invoice transaction summary records.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of existing Invoice transaction summary records that have been modified since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new Invoice transaction summary records since the last run time.
